alternatives.answer: The Scrum-master is responsible for the prioritizing of requirements.
The Scrum Master is responsible for ensuring that Scrum is used in the process.

title: Customer
question: A client contacts you regarding a change in the product you are developing. The customer wants the product to also support the German language. Where do you place the new requirement?

title: Normal day
information: It's a normal day at the office. Nothing special to notice. Have a great day!
funFact: Did you know that Softhouse was founded in 1996 in Malmö and has since grown to 7 offices around Sweden?

title: Day of illness
information: Oh no, you've caught a cold. You therefore stay at home to rest. Today your colleagues therefore have a little extra to do.
consequence: The work phase gets a little slower. You loose 3 velocity points.

title: Normal day
information: It's a normal day. Keep on playing.
funFact: Did you know that Softhouse was founded in 1996 in Malmö and has since grown to 7 offices around Sweden?

title: Normal Day
information: It's a normal day at the office. Nothing special to notice. Have a great day!

title: Normal Day
information: It's a calm day at the office. Keep rolling the dice!
